faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to the questions we get asked most often.

whatIs.question: What is a URL shortener?
whatIs.answer: A URL shortener turns long web addresses into short, easy-to-share links that still point to the original page.

howWork.question: How does Shrnkly work?
howWork.answer: Just paste your long URL, click shorten, and get a short link you can customize, track, protect and turn into a QR code.

isFree.question: Is Shrnkly free?
isFree.answer: Yes — the core features (shortening, basic stats, QR codes) are completely free forever. Premium plans unlock custom domains, advanced analytics, and higher limits.

canTrack.question: Can I see who clicks my links?
canTrack.answer: Yes! You get detailed analytics: click count, countries, cities, devices, browsers, referrers, and time trends.

customDomain.question: Can I use my own domain?
customDomain.answer: Yes — on paid plans you can use yourbrand.link, go.yourdomain.com, etc. to create fully branded short links.

howLong.question: Do short links expire?
howLong.answer: By default, no — they last forever. You can optionally set expiration dates on any link.

limit.question: Is there a limit on free accounts?
limit.answer: Free users can create up to 100 short links per month. Paid plans offer unlimited links.

safe.question: Are the links safe?
safe.answer: We scan URLs for malware, use HTTPS everywhere, and offer password protection (premium) to keep your audience safe.

cta.subheading: We're here to help — just reach out to our support team.

hero.subheading: Create clean, beautiful, shareable links for your text, code snippets, notes and markdown — no account needed.

features.subheading: Made for developers, writers, teams — fast, secure, and full of useful controls.

instant.title: Instant Sharing
instant.description: Paste → Create → Share. No registration required for basic use.

password.title: Password Protection
password.description: Keep sensitive notes, configs or code private — only people with the password can view.

expire.title: Auto-expiration
expire.description: Set a future deletion date so nothing stays online forever unless you want it to.

analytics.title: View Analytics
analytics.description: See how many times your paste was opened, from where, and on what devices.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Optimized infrastructure means your shared text loads instantly worldwide.

secure.title: Encrypted & Private
secure.description: Content is encrypted in transit & at rest. You can delete it permanently anytime.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Common questions about sharing text, code and notes.

whatIs.question: What is text sharing?
whatIs.answer: A simple way to turn any piece of text, code, markdown or notes into a private or public shareable link.

howWork.question: How does it work?
howWork.answer: Paste your content, choose formatting (plain, markdown, code), optionally add password/expiration, and get an instant link.

isFree.question: Is text sharing free?
isFree.answer: Yes — basic sharing, password protection, expiration and view tracking are free. Premium unlocks unlimited shares and more controls.

passwordProtect.question: Can I password-protect shares?
passwordProtect.answer: Yes — add a password so only people who know it can see your content.

expiration.question: Can I make shares expire?
expiration.answer: Yes — set any future date and time. After that the content is automatically deleted.

howLong.question: How long do shares last?
howLong.answer: They last until the expiration date you set, or until the view limit is reached — whichever comes first.

limit.question: Is there a limit on free accounts?
limit.answer: Free users can create up to 10 text shares. Paid plans offer unlimited shares.

secure.question: Is my content secure?
secure.answer: Yes — encrypted in transit and at rest. You control deletion, expiration and access.

cta.subheading: Can't find the answer? Just send us a message — we're happy to help.

hero.subheading: Generate beautiful, scannable QR codes for URLs, text, WiFi, contacts and more — completely free, no signup required.

features.subheading: Powerful tools to create, customize, and share QR codes — all in one place, completely free.

instant.title: Instant Generation

customization.title: Full Customization
customization.description: Choose colors, sizes, and error correction levels to match your brand.

private.title: 100% Private
private.description: All QR generation happens in your browser. Nothing is sent to our servers.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Download as PNG for images or SVG for scalable vector graphics.

types.title: Multiple Types
types.description: URLs, text, WiFi credentials, vCards, SMS, email — all supported.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.description: Generate QR codes even without an internet connection.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to common questions about QR codes.

whatIs.question: What is a QR code?
whatIs.answer: A QR (Quick Response) code is a 2D barcode that stores information in a square grid. When scanned with a smartphone camera, it instantly displays the encoded content like URLs, text, or contact info.

howWork.question: How does this QR generator work?
howWork.answer: Simply enter your content (URL, text, WiFi details, etc.), customize colors and size if desired, and the QR code is generated instantly in your browser — no server required.

isFree.question: Is this QR code generator free?
isFree.answer: Yes! All features are completely free — unlimited QR codes, full customization, multiple formats (PNG/SVG), and no signup required.

safe.question: Are QR codes safe to scan?
safe.answer: QR codes themselves are safe. However, always verify the destination before entering sensitive information. Our generator creates standard QR codes that work with any scanner.

expire.question: Do QR codes expire?
expire.answer: Static QR codes (like those generated here) never expire — they encode the data directly. However, if the content changes (like a URL destination), you'll need to generate a new QR code.

scan.question: How do I scan a QR code?
scan.answer: Most modern smartphones can scan QR codes with the built-in camera app. Just point your camera at the code and tap the notification that appears.

formats.question: What's the difference between PNG and SVG?
formats.answer: PNG is a raster image format (pixels), great for web use. SVG is a vector format (math-based), perfect for print as it scales to any size without quality loss.

errorCorrection.question: What is error correction?
errorCorrection.answer: Error correction allows QR codes to still work even if partially damaged. Higher levels (Q, H) add more redundancy but make the code larger. Use H for logos or harsh environments.

cta.subheading: Can't find the answer? Just send us a message — we're happy to help.
Join thousands of users creating beautiful, custom QR codes every day. No signup required.

generator.title: Job Title
generator.subject: Subject
generator.agreementPrefix: By generating QR codes, you agree to our

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At Shrnkly we care deeply about your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it when you use our service.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect only the information necessary to provide our service:
infoList: URLs you shorten and where they point

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use this data to deliver the service, show you analytics, prevent abuse, improve features, and keep the platform safe and fast.

analytics.title: 4. Click Analytics
analytics.content: When someone clicks a short link we collect anonymized data (approximate location, device type, referrer, browser) to provide you with useful statistics.

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: We use industry-standard security practices. While no system is 100% secure, we work hard to protect your data.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Shrnkly you agree to these Terms of Service. If you don't agree, please don't use the service.

description.title: 2. Our Services
description.content: Shrnkly provides three core services: (1) URL shortening with analytics and QR code generation, (2) secure text sharing for code, notes and documents, and (3) custom QR code generation for URLs, text, WiFi, contacts and more. We may update or change features at any time.

responsibilities.title: 3. Your Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You must not use Shrnkly to:
infoList: Send spam, phishing attempts or unsolicited messages
Spread malware, viruses or harmful code
Link to or share illegal, abusive or infringing content
Share sensitive information (passwords, API keys, personal data)
Generate QR codes that deceive users or bypass security
Violate any applicable laws or third-party rights

qrCodes.title: 4. QR Code Usage
qrCodes.content: QR codes generated on Shrnkly are for legitimate purposes only. You are responsible for where your QR codes lead. We may disable QR codes or block domains that violate these terms, engage in phishing, or distribute malicious content. QR codes are static — if the destination changes, you must generate a new QR code.

textSharing.title: 5. Text Sharing Rules
textSharing.content: When sharing text, code or notes: (1) You retain ownership of your content, (2) Do not share copyrighted material without permission, (3) Do not share secrets, credentials or sensitive data even with password protection, (4) Set appropriate expiration dates for temporary content, (5) We may remove content that violates these terms or receives abuse reports.

urlShortening.title: 6. URL Shortening & Analytics
urlShortening.content: Shortened URLs redirect to their destinations. We collect anonymized click analytics (location, device, referrer) to provide statistics. We may disable links that violate these terms, receive abuse reports, or point to malicious sites. Free links may have usage limits and may expire after extended inactivity.

property.title: 7. Our Intellectual Property
property.content: The Shrnkly name, design, code and logo are ours. You may not copy or use them without permission.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We provide the service "as is". We are not responsible for lost profits, data loss, service interruptions, or any damages resulting from use of our services.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or harm the platform or other users.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help
contact.description: Have a question about URL shortening, text sharing, or QR codes? Need support or want to report an issue? We're here to help — just send us a message.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to common questions about our pricing and plans.

whatIsFree.question: What's included in the free plan?
whatIsFree.answer: Our free plan includes up to 20 URLs per month, 20 text shares, full analytics, QR code generation, custom slugs, and rate-limited API access. Perfect for regular users!

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
upgrade.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges or credits.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

refund.question: Is there a refund policy?
refund.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with Premium, contact us within 14 days for a full refund.

limits.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
limits.answer: If you exceed your monthly URL or text share limits, you'll need to wait until next month or upgrade to Premium for unlimited usage.

premiumFeatures.question: What makes Premium worth it?
premiumFeatures.answer: Premium gives you unlimited URLs and text shares, advanced analytics with export, custom QR codes, password protection, link expiration, full API access, and priority support.

annualDiscount.question: Do you offer annual plans?
annualDiscount.answer: Yes! Save 20% with our annual Premium plan. That's 2 months free compared to monthly billing.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel anytime from your account settings. Your Premium features will remain active until the end of your billing period.

cta.subheading: Join thousands of marketers, creators, developers and businesses who trust Shrnkly every day.
